participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, nurturing, and adventurous. Emma loves trying new things and values her friendships highly.
participant_1.background: I am getting married in the spring. I love eating out with friends. I am 24 years old. My favorite singer is Taylor Swift. I work at a school as a kindergarten teacher.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Daring, energetic, and bookish. Jake balances his thrill-seeking profession with a love for reading and reflection.
participant_2.background: I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. I am a stunt double as my second job. I read twenty books a year. I was raised in a single parent household. I only eat kosher.

content.text: Hey, I'm a kindergarten teacher!
Oh, that's cool! I'm a stunt double.
Wow, that's so interesting! What's it like to be a stunt double?
It's a lot of fun! I get to do all sorts of crazy stunts, and I get paid to do it.
That's awesome! I've always thought it would be cool to be a stunt double.
It's definitely a lot of fun. But it's also a lot of work. You have to be in really good shape, and you have to be able to take a lot of punishment.
I can imagine! But it sounds like it would be worth it.
It definitely is. I love my job.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're doing something you love.
Me too! I'm really lucky.
So, what's your favorite stunt you've ever done?
That's a tough question. I've done so many cool stunts. I guess I'd have to say my favorite was the time I jumped off a 100-foot building.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I can't even imagine doing something like that.
It was definitely scary, but it was also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it was.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to eat out with friends, go to concerts, and read.
Oh, I love to read too! What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure I have a favorite book, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Me too! They're some of my favorite books.
So, do you have any big plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just going to keep doing what I'm doing and see where it takes me.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
